entry.title: 14"x108" Rose Quartz Sequin Circle Designs Table Runners
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 5.18 - 244.08 (2 variants)

[About]

  • Measurements: 14" wide x 108" length
  • Material: Shiny Sequin Beads in a circular pattern atop Organza fabric
  • How to Care: Dry clean only
  • Seamless, 1 pc design. Edges are serged.
  • ﻿All sizes are approximate measurements
  • Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

These Glamorous Sequin accented Organza Table Runners, specially handcrafted to impart an ethereal touch to your party Decor. Stunning shiny sequin circles are used to create a gorgeous ring design throughout premium quality organza fabric. Pair with our sequin adorned napkins, chair covers, drapery, or chair sashes to create a cohesive party mood, or with crisp white shades to add extra flair and dimension to your party ambiance.

Additional Information:

  • Measurements: 14" wide x 108" length
  • Material: Shiny Sequin Beads in a circular pattern atop Organza fabric
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration
  • NOTE: Sale is for table runner only, no other accessories included

entry.title: 14"x108" Eggplant Premium Sequin Taffeta Table Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 3.08

[About]

Quantity: 1 Table Runner
Material: Tafetta
Size: 12" W x 108" L
How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use a dryer.
Seamless, Edges are serged.
Works beautifully with our tablecloths.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

We've purposely embroidered a jewel-like design as the sequin style to create a more classy appeal that works beautifully with a bright or dimmed lights that are then highlighted with LEDs and spotlights and possibly even with diamond-like acrylic ornaments on manzanitas added. So work the bejeweled sequin table runners with various sparkling decorative accessories and you will have your sparkling castle to boast.

Additional Information:

  • Measurements: 14" wide x 108"
  • Material: High quality taffeta
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • Seamless, 1 pc design. Edges are serged.
  • Works beautifully with our tablecloths
  • For table runner only, table covers and other decorations are sold separately.
  • No actual real or fake jewels attached to fabric, the 'bejeweled' name simply reflects on how the fabric is appreciated when viewed as a whole
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

Our eye-catching taffeta flocking table runner is an ideal choice to dress up those lackluster table covers and old-fashioned tables. The seamless luster of high quality taffeta combined with the modish flocking design adds a chic appeal to these splendid runners. Create a super classy table presentation with these stylish runners spread elegantly atop your wedding or banquet tables. Pair these with our sparkling glitter accented table tops, centerpieces or vases for much exotic effect.

  • Material: Taffeta Flocking
